body:
This issue has been resolved in the 1.3.3-release branch. For specific solutions, please refer to issue #3719 
please update the title in English, thanks

@xingchun-chen And I found the authorization is in view of the files in the directory, and is not A directory, the user to create A after upload multiple files in A directory in the directory, through the admin account after this directory permissions awarded B users, is directed against the file directory, B directory is not able to in the user to create A directory to any folder to create and file upload。 

并且我发现授权其实是针对目录中的文件，并不是目录，A用户创建目录后上传多个文件在A目录后，通过admin账号授予B用户此目录权限后，也是针对目录中的文件，B目录是不能够在A用户创建的目录中进行任何文件夹创建以及文件上传的
I tried my local code , authorized the files in the directory to user B, user B can create files in the directory. Are you sure the code is up to date?
one PR need one corresponding issue, so please create an issue for PR next time

a process instance correspond a masterExecThread，a masterExecThread only can start up 20 taskExecThread to excute task in parallel default，if you want improve it，modify parameter master.exec.task.num=20，80 or more in master.properties

for example，suppose there are two queues, queue_one and default(Provided by default), and two task task_one, task_two
| task_one | task_two | run_workflow | task_one_exec | task_two_exec |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| queue_one | default | default | queue_one | default |
| queue_one | default | queue_one | queue_one | queue_one |

I think this is not a bug

There is a linux account dolphinscheduler on the machine where dolphinschduler is installed. This account is sudoer and is not secret-free. Dolphinschduler can already execute all root permissions.

If you think the permissions of the dolphinscheduler tenant are too large, there are several implementation options
1. Dolphinscheduler tenants only manage users, perform tenants that do not perform specific tasks
2. Linux sudo can set only user list, so dolphinschedule users can only access the user list you added with sudo, without root authority.

我认为这不是一个bug
dolphinschduler安装的机器上有 linux账号 dolphinscheduler，这个账号是sudoer，且免密，dolphinscheduler已经可以执行root的所有权限。

如果你认为dolphinscheduler租户的权限太大，可以有几种实现方案
1.dolphinscheduler租户只是管理用户，不做具体任务的执行租户
2.linux sudo 可以设置只用户列表，这样dolphinschedule用户只能sudo访问你添加的用户列表，没有root的权限。
